name: Luxury Villa with Ocean View
detail: Stunning villa located on a cliff with panoramic ocean views. Features 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, spacious living areas, infinity pool, and private beach access.

name: Downtown Penthouse
detail: Modern penthouse located in the heart of the city. Features floor-to-ceiling windows, open concept living space, gourmet kitchen, and rooftop terrace with city skyline views.

name: Mountain Retreat Cabin
detail: Cozy cabin nestled in the mountains. Features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, stone fireplace, wrap-around porch, and breathtaking views of the surrounding forest.

name: Beachfront Condo
detail: Charming beachfront condo with direct access to the sand. Features 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, updated kitchen, spacious balcony, and resort-style amenities.

name: Country Estate
detail: Elegant country estate set on sprawling acres of land. Features a grand mansion with 7 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, formal gardens, swimming pool, and guest house.

name: City Townhouse
detail: Chic townhouse located in a trendy urban neighborhood. Features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, modern finishes, private courtyard, and attached garage.

name: Lakefront Retreat
detail: Tranquil lakefront property perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities. Features a cozy cottage with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, large deck, and private dock.

name: Ski Chalet
detail: Quaint ski chalet located in a prime mountain resort area. Features 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, stone fireplace, hot tub, and stunning views of the slopes.
